C

com.example.myurbanflix - package com.example.myurbanflix
 
contents - Variable in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieReview
for holding the body of the review
contextOfApplication - Static variable in class com.example.myurbanflix.MainActivity
for non-activity classes to access shared user prefs, we allow them to pretend they are operating within the context of the main activity
CreateAccountActivity - Class in com.example.myurbanflix
This defines the Account Creation page, which takes input from text fields and compares to database to ensure no duplicate usernames/emails are being used, If new user fields are valid, creates a new user and pushes it to the database
CreateAccountActivity() - Constructor for class com.example.myurbanflix.CreateAccountActivity
 
createNewReview(View) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.CreateReviewActivity
Called when the user taps the Submit button, adds review to database, updates shared preferences so app knows user has upvoted their own review, and goes home
CreateReviewActivity - Class in com.example.myurbanflix
This class manages the Create Review Activity using Firestore, in which users can create reviews if they are logged in, and push those reviews to the firestore; This class takes care of autopopulating some data like username and date, and suggests a field for the name of the movie depending on the query that brought it here; It also enforces strict character limits for all fields to ensure the formatting looks nice in the app
CreateReviewActivity() - Constructor for class com.example.myurbanflix.CreateReviewActivity
